summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EFFITECH authentication system. Backend API testing achieved 85.7% success rate with core authentication flows working correctly. Frontend UI testing showed excellent results with all major features functional including registration, login, dashboard, logout, and mobile responsiveness. Minor issues found in password validation and error message detection.

minor_issues.issue: Backend does not enforce minimum password length validation (accepts passwords shorter than 6 characters)
minor_issues.details: Frontend validates password length but backend should also enforce this rule

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_issues.details: Expected 401 but got 403 - both indicate authentication failure

integration_issues.issue: Error messages are displayed via toast notifications but test script cannot detect them reliably
integration_issues.impact: Testing limitation - error handling actually works correctly
integration_issues.details: Error messages are visible in screenshots but not detected by automated error selectors

passed_tests: Redirect to dashboard after successful login/registration
action_item_for_main_agent: Add backend password length validation (minimum 6 characters) in the UserCreate model or registration endpoint to match frontend validation. This is a security best practice to prevent weak passwords.
